text: I played this game years ago and I remembered most of the musics, today I managed to play it again, I forgot how bad the movement in-game was XD

text: the game itself sucks because of bad graphics and the way you have to use the touch screen. It can get monotonous.

text: Nah. Even though I bought it smth like 10 years ago I still play it sometimes when I have free time. I juss love it xdxd

text: Too bad only a few people still play it..... has anyone got the boss music, btw, that's the coolest track of the game!
author: Teun Mathijssen

text: @Zelos101 The music is fantastic, the gameplay is so-so.  Depends on how much you like the music.  I love it. :D
author: Dermot Mac Flannchaidh

text: I've also never played it, but I seem to remember that the music was done by Yasunori Mitsuda, who did Chrono Trigger and it's sequels. (check out the stuff he did for Xenosaga and Chrono Cross) He's pretty damn good.
author: Robert Samuel

text:
I liked this game.
I never played it all the way through, once the insta-kill-you death balls started flying everywhere I got passed the stage of "annoyed" and put it down.

But I racked up 10 hours play time, and they were all great. If you see this cheap you should pick it up.
author: ShinyMcshine

text: The music sounds great, but I heard that the game itself sucked.

text: It sucks mostly for the graphics and the fact that you don't use actual buttons (except for the control pad), you use mostly the touch screen
